key.name: override-restrictions
key.description: Override document restrictions, like restriction to copy or to print.

key.name: auto-reload
key.description: The document is automatically reloaded on file change.

key.name: document-directory
key.summary: The URI of the directory last used to open or save a document

key.name: pictures-directory
key.summary: The URI of the directory last used to save a picture

key.name: page-cache-size
key.description: The maximum size that will be used to cache rendered pages, limits maximum zoom level.

key.name: show-caret-navigation-message
key.summary: Show a dialog to confirm that the user wants to activate the caret navigation.

key.name: allow-links-change-zoom
key.summary: Allow links to change the zoom level.

key.name: enable-spellchecking
key.summary: Check spelling when writing annotation notes or filling text forms.

key.name: show-sidebar
key.summary: Show a side bar next to the document to help navigate the document.

key.name: zoom
key.summary: Set the default zoom level to display a document.

key.name: continuous
key.summary: Display the document as a continuous stream of pages instead of page at a time.

key.name: dual-page
key.summary: Show two pages side by side.

key.name: dual-page-odd-left
key.summary: Show the first page (odd page) on the left (when displaying two pages side by side)
